name: Wall Of Expression
description:
"Wall of Expression" is a Casual Game where you can draw some stuff on the Berlin Wall back in it's day. This game was made for the "Historically Accurate Game Jam 3" within a week with the theme of "Cold War".

Back in 1961 - 1989 a wall stood tall to separate West Berlin and East Berlin during the Cold War. In the East side, there were  Guard Dogs, Traps, and Soldiers to prevent people from crossing to the West side.

However, in the West side, people were drawing Art and Grafiti as a way to express their opinion and emotion regarding the Wall and the War...

Feature:

- 7 Brush

- 4 Art inspired from events and arts related to Berlin Wall itself

I'm still a Beginner in GameDev and this is my first time trying to draw non Pixelated stuff, and it looks like I still have to learn more XD

If you have any feedback then please do tell it down in the Comment. Thank you for reading / downloading :D
